txt.en: Within the ruins of Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, an Angmarim ritual had taken place, defiling the depths of the old watch-tower….\n\nYour mission is to thwart the ghastly presence at Shakal-atrâd.
You have been tasked with thwarting the ghastly presence at Shakal-atrâd.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have returned from Shakal-atrâd. Angmarim have taken refuge at the old dwarf watch-post. This can not stand! We must return to Shakal-atrâd and put an end to what ever presence remains there!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to thwart the ghastly presence at Shakal-atrâd.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Shakal-atrâd.
'Well done! With the ruins clear, the tower may once again be a watch-post for the dwarves! If we are to keep the road to Gundabad clear, Shakal-atrâd must remain under our protection.'
